Patsha Bay bụ onye Congolese na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu ama maka Viva Riva! (2010) na Of Sentimental Value (2016).

Patasha Bay rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na Viva Riva! nke Djo Tunda wa Munga duziri n'afọ 2010, nke nwetara nhọpụta iri na abụọ ma merie onyinye isii na 7th Africa Movie Academy Awards. A họpụtakwara ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ihe nrite Leading Role maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ.
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Of Sentimental Value n'afọ 2016.
